column4: Uncategorized;Kampot: Unconfirmed reports say a foreign woman was walking in Kampot at 3 am on October 11
column5: when she was dragged into a car by three men and raped.------More details have not been released
column6: but initial reports say that Kampot police and gendarmerie had received a complaint from the victim and are investigating. ------SOURCE------UPDATE: ------New source CEN
